Articles.Content:
Hello everybody!

TP here with a little lifter I spent a few hours on. It does away with all aesthetics, very low part count and a very affordable price tag.

These crafts will tickle in here on the Exchange in a slow rate and will be part of a larger collection of budget-lifters built by yours truly. 

First in the line of crafts I have in mind is the small rocket named 'Kobold'. I will be using the names from the "Dungeons and Dragons"-lore for the rockets. 

![2015-03-10_00002_zpsuzdvqlfw.jpg](http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo19/TimePeriod/2015-03-10_00002_zpsuzdvqlfw.jpg)

Dragonforge Technologies (DFT)

Cargo Launch System (CLS)

0-5T 'Kobold' (A3) *A3 Refers to the model number and the specific version of that model.* 

19.000$$$

Low Kerbin Orbit 5.0625T ~ 176 dv+exs.(70-71km) *This line refers to the actual payload tonnage, excess dV left after orbital insertion and the actual orbit achieved.* 

Launch time to LKO: 10 minutes.

46 parts(-3) *This line refers to the final tally of parts and the number of parts used as payload weight estimation*

48,7T AL *At launch*

Launch procedure will come later. 

I will make a spreadsheet of each lifter at some point with a launch procedure feel free to comment and ask questions.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T19:18:46Z" title="03/10/2015 07:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by TimePeriod**
